Task - Class in net.jdazher.domain.tasks.model
A class that represents a task in the system.
Task(String, String, LocalDateTime) - Constructor for class net.jdazher.domain.tasks.model.Task
Constructor to create a Task with a title, description, and due date without tags.
Task(String, String, LocalDateTime, List<TaskTag>) - Constructor for class net.jdazher.domain.tasks.model.Task
Constructor to create a Task with a title, description, due date, and tags.
Task(UUID, String, String, LocalDateTime, TaskStatus, List<TaskTag>) - Constructor for class net.jdazher.domain.tasks.model.Task
Constructor to create a Task with an existing ID, title, description, due date, status, and tags.

REST controller for managing tasks.

An interface representing a task-related event in the system.

A repository interface for managing Task entities.
TaskSchedulerComponent - Class in net.jdazher.infrastructure.tasks.scheduler
Component that schedules the checking of tasks to determine if any are due.

An interface representing a service for managing tasks in the system.
TaskStatus - Enum Class in net.jdazher.domain.tasks.model
An enumeration representing the various statuses a task can have in the system.
TaskTag - Class in net.jdazher.domain.tasks.model
A class representing a tag that can be associated with a task.
